div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 184 Kato Kleitoria, near Tripolis, Arcadia, 1936 Burial: c. 220 B.C. (Oeconomides, Picard) Contents: 14 AE Antigonus Gonatas: 2 Sicyon: 2 Ptolemy III: 10 Disposition: Athens Varoucha, Epitymbion Christou Tsounta (Athens, 1941), p. 676, no. 7 (records 10 Ptolemaic)
